issue.title: mail.google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#inbox](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.google.com%2Fmail%2Fu%2F0%2F%23inbox) ### Comment > I am not able to download attachments from GMail. The same goes for Google Drive, I click the download button it does request some domains but it doesn't start the download. This issue is kinda weird because when I turn off and restart firefox, now I can download files from GMail and GDrive. But just turning the protection on/off still won't let me download files from GMail/GDrive. Maybe you can find a way to fix this because when I reported this to Google, they didn't like the idea of me mentioning Adguard, they tried to blaim it on Adguard directly which I think is unfair. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/me2EIuk.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/me2EIuk.jpg)

Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,

Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Flash DNS filtering: | server: `quic://dns.adguard-dns.com`
